thread.title: Asif is a big foodie: Aparna Vinod
thread.title_full: Asif is a big foodie: Aparna Vinod - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Asif is a big foodie: Aparna Vinod
text:
Asif Ali's love for food has turned him a food outlet entrepreneur, putting him in the league of other similar culinary enthusiasts of M-Town, including Dileep , Siddique, Aashiq Abu and Rima.
His co-star from the film Kohinoor, Aparna Vinod reveals how big a foodie the actor is. Apparently, he is quite an eloquent speaker too, when it comes to matters relating to food.
She recalls, "Asif absolutely loves food and even talks a lot about food. One day, he was very seriously zooming in on to something on his phone while on the set. Peeping in, what I saw was the tempting pictures of some enticing food varieties."
Asif is not just a lover of different cuisines but a big time prankster as well on the set, Aparna adds. The actress confesses she couldn't help but fall prey to his tricks!
She narrates, "He used to scare me often, telling the director Vinay Govind 'Lets change Aparna! Do you still have the other girl's footage from auditions? We will recast!' They used to laugh out loud, seeing me all worked up."
